reviewText: I liked the format of Susie's teaching. I was able to learn a lot and improved my painting of water. Also DVD's work for me as I can stop them any time I need to , or rewind to watch again. Would recommend this art DVD.

Susie Short is amazing.  These are wonderful instructional videos even for a novice painter to expert that wants to learn to paint an exciting realistic looking waveform or seascape.  She is fun to watch and easy to follow.  I highly recommend both of these together to really learn the watercolor technique of painting the sea.
